CSSStyleRule

CSSStyleRule represents a single CSS style rule. It implements the CSSRule interface with a type value of 1 (CSSRule.STYLE_RULE).

Syntax

The syntax is described using the WebIDL format.

interface CSSStyleRule : CSSRule {
    attribute DOMString selectorText;
    readonly attribute CSSStyleDeclaration style;
};

Properties

CSSStyleRule.selectorText
Gets the textual representation of the selector for this rule, e.g. "h1,h2".
CSSStyleRule.style
Returns the CSSStyleDeclaration object for the rule.

Specifications

Specification Status Comment
CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
The definition of 'CSSStyleRule' in that specification.		 Working Draft No changes
Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification
The definition of 'CSSRule' in that specification.		 Obsolete
